Articles.Content:
One thing that I always really really wanted for KSP had to be airbags for rovers and impacts. I always wanted to make an opportunity rover replica in ksp but unfortunately the soft body physics and bouncing/damage mitigation seemed to be something hard to mod into the first game.

I'd absolutely love to see these added into the game. I've truly always wanted to do a true to life mock up of the opportunity landing. Only of course, I'd pick the wrong spot and watch my Rover go bouncing like a rubber ball down the biggest mountain on duna.
Would be a very nice addition to the game
